segment.source: Troubleshooting Advanced Group Policy Management
segment.target: Troubleshooting Advanced Group Policy Management

segment.source: Troubleshooting Advanced Group Policy Management
segment.target: Troubleshooting Advanced Group Policy Management

segment.source: Troubleshooting Advanced Group Policy Management
segment.target: Troubleshooting Advanced Group Policy Management

segment.source: This section lists a few common issues you may encounter when using Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) to manage Group Policy objects (GPOs).
segment.target: This section lists a few common issues you may encounter when using Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) to manage Group Policy objects (GPOs).

segment.source: What problems are you having?
segment.target: What problems are you having?

segment.source: I am unable to access an archive
segment.target: I am unable to access an archive

segment.source: The GPO state varies for different Group Policy administrators
segment.target: The GPO state varies for different Group Policy administrators

segment.source: I am unable to modify the AGPM Server connection
segment.target: I am unable to modify the AGPM Server connection

segment.source: I am unable to change the default template or view, create, edit, rename, deploy, or delete GPOs
segment.target: I am unable to change the default template or view, create, edit, rename, deploy, or delete GPOs

segment.source: I am unable to use a particular GPO name
segment.target: I am unable to use a particular GPO name

segment.source: I am not receiving AGPM e-mail notifications
segment.target: I am not receiving AGPM e-mail notifications

segment.source: I cannot use port 4600 for the AGPM Service
segment.target: I cannot use port 4600 for the AGPM Service

segment.source: The AGPM Service will not start
segment.target: The AGPM Service will not start

segment.source: Group Policy Software Installation fails to install software
segment.target: Group Policy Software Installation fails to install software

segment.source: I am unable to access an archive
segment.target: I am unable to access an archive

segment.source: Cause: You have not selected the correct server and port for the archive.
segment.target: Cause: You have not selected the correct server and port for the archive.

segment.source: Solution:
segment.target: Solution:

segment.source: If you are an AGPM Administrator: See Configure the AGPM Server Connection.
segment.target: If you are an AGPM Administrator: See Configure the AGPM Server Connection.

segment.source: If you are not an AGPM Administrator: Request connection details for the AGPM Server from an AGPM Administrator.
segment.target: If you are not an AGPM Administrator: Request connection details for the AGPM Server from an AGPM Administrator.

segment.source: See Configure the AGPM Server Connection.
segment.target: See Configure the AGPM Server Connection.

segment.source: Cause: The Advanced Group Policy Management Service is not running.
segment.target: Cause: The Advanced Group Policy Management Service is not running.

segment.source: Solution:
segment.target: Solution:

segment.source: If you are an AGPM Administrator: Start the AGPM Service.
segment.target: If you are an AGPM Administrator: Start the AGPM Service.

segment.source: For more information, see Start and Stop the AGPM Service.
segment.target: For more information, see Start and Stop the AGPM Service.

segment.source: If you are not an AGPM Administrator: Contact an AGPM Administrator for assistance.
segment.target: If you are not an AGPM Administrator: Contact an AGPM Administrator for assistance.

segment.source: The GPO state varies for different Group Policy administrators
segment.target: The GPO state varies for different Group Policy administrators

segment.source: Cause: Different Group Policy administrators have selected different AGPM Servers for the same archive.
segment.target: Cause: Different Group Policy administrators have selected different AGPM Servers for the same archive.

segment.source: Solution:
segment.target: Solution:

segment.source: If you are an AGPM Administrator: See Configure the AGPM Server Connection.
segment.target: If you are an AGPM Administrator: See Configure the AGPM Server Connection.

segment.source: If you are not an AGPM Administrator: Request connection details for the AGPM Server from an AGPM Administrator.
segment.target: If you are not an AGPM Administrator: Request connection details for the AGPM Server from an AGPM Administrator.

segment.source: See Configure the AGPM Server Connection.
segment.target: See Configure the AGPM Server Connection.

segment.source: I am unable to modify the AGPM Server connection
segment.target: I am unable to modify the AGPM Server connection

segment.source: Cause: If the settings on the AGPM Server tab are unavailable, the AGPM Server has been centrally configured using an Administrative template.
segment.target: Cause: If the settings on the AGPM Server tab are unavailable, the AGPM Server has been centrally configured using an Administrative template.

segment.source: Solution:
segment.target: Solution:

segment.source: If you are an AGPM Administrator: If the settings on the AGPM Server tab are unavailable, see Configure the AGPM Server Connection.
segment.target: If you are an AGPM Administrator: If the settings on the AGPM Server tab are unavailable, see Configure the AGPM Server Connection.

segment.source: If you are not an AGPM Administrator: If the settings on the AGPM Server tab are unavailable, you do not need to modify the AGPM Server.
segment.target: If you are not an AGPM Administrator: If the settings on the AGPM Server tab are unavailable, you do not need to modify the AGPM Server.

segment.source: I am unable to change the default template or view, create, edit, rename, deploy, or delete GPOs
segment.target: I am unable to change the default template or view, create, edit, rename, deploy, or delete GPOs

segment.source: Cause: You have not been assigned a role with the permissions required to perform the task or tasks.
segment.target: Cause: You have not been assigned a role with the permissions required to perform the task or tasks.

segment.source: Solution:
segment.target: Solution:

segment.source: If you are an AGPM Administrator: See Delegate Domain-Level Access and Delegate Access to an Individual GPO.
segment.target: If you are an AGPM Administrator: See Delegate Domain-Level Access and Delegate Access to an Individual GPO.

segment.source: AGPM permissions will cascade from the domain to all GPOs currently in the archive.
segment.target: AGPM permissions will cascade from the domain to all GPOs currently in the archive.

segment.source: As new Group Policy administrators are added at the domain level, their permissions must be set to apply to This object and nested objects.
segment.target: As new Group Policy administrators are added at the domain level, their permissions must be set to apply to This object and nested objects.

segment.source: For details about which roles can perform a task and what permissions are necessary to perform a task, refer to the help for that task.
segment.target: For details about which roles can perform a task and what permissions are necessary to perform a task, refer to the help for that task.

segment.source: If you are not an AGPM Administrator and you require additional roles or permissions: Contact an AGPM Administrator for assistance.
segment.target: If you are not an AGPM Administrator and you require additional roles or permissions: Contact an AGPM Administrator for assistance.

segment.source: Note that if you are an Editor, you can begin the process of creating a GPO, deploying a GPO, or deleting a GPO from the production environment, but an Approver or AGPM Administrator must approve your request.
segment.target: Note that if you are an Editor, you can begin the process of creating a GPO, deploying a GPO, or deleting a GPO from the production environment, but an Approver or AGPM Administrator must approve your request.

segment.source: I am unable to use a particular GPO name
segment.target: I am unable to use a particular GPO name

segment.source: Cause: Either the GPO name is already in use or you lack permission to list the GPO.
segment.target: Cause: Either the GPO name is already in use or you lack permission to list the GPO.

segment.source: Solution:
segment.target: Solution:

segment.source: If the GPO name appears on the Controlled, Uncontrolled, or Pending tab, choose another name.
segment.target: If the GPO name appears on the Controlled, Uncontrolled, or Pending tab, choose another name.

segment.source: If a GPO that has been deployed is renamed but not yet redeployed, it will be displayed under its old name in the production environment—therefore, the old name is still in use.
segment.target: If a GPO that has been deployed is renamed but not yet redeployed, it will be displayed under its old name in the production environment—therefore, the old name is still in use.

segment.source: Redeploy the GPO to update its name in the production environment and release that name for use by another GPO.
segment.target: Redeploy the GPO to update its name in the production environment and release that name for use by another GPO.

segment.source: If the GPO name does not appear on the Controlled, Uncontrolled, or Pending tab, you may lack permission to list the GPO.
segment.target: If the GPO name does not appear on the Controlled, Uncontrolled, or Pending tab, you may lack permission to list the GPO.

segment.source: To request permission, contact an AGPM Administrator.
segment.target: To request permission, contact an AGPM Administrator.

segment.source: I am not receiving AGPM e-mail notifications
segment.target: I am not receiving AGPM e-mail notifications

segment.source: Cause: A valid SMTP e-mail server and e-mail address has not been provided, or no action has been taken that generates an e-mail notification.
segment.target: Cause: A valid SMTP e-mail server and e-mail address has not been provided, or no action has been taken that generates an e-mail notification.

segment.source: Solution:
segment.target: Solution:

segment.source: If you are an AGPM Administrator: For e-mail notifications about pending actions to be sent by AGPM, an AGPM Administrator must provide a valid SMTP e-mail server and e-mail addresses for Approvers on the Domain Delegation tab.
segment.target: If you are an AGPM Administrator: For e-mail notifications about pending actions to be sent by AGPM, an AGPM Administrator must provide a valid SMTP e-mail server and e-mail addresses for Approvers on the Domain Delegation tab.

segment.source: For more information, see Configure E-Mail Notification.
segment.target: For more information, see Configure E-Mail Notification.

segment.source: E-mail notifications are generated only when an Editor, Reviewer, or other Group Policy administrator who lacks the permission necessary to create, deploy, or delete a GPO submits a request for one of those actions to occur.
segment.target: E-mail notifications are generated only when an Editor, Reviewer, or other Group Policy administrator who lacks the permission necessary to create, deploy, or delete a GPO submits a request for one of those actions to occur.

segment.source: There is no automatic notification of approval or rejection of a request.
segment.target: There is no automatic notification of approval or rejection of a request.

segment.source: I cannot use port 4600 for the AGPM Service
segment.target: I cannot use port 4600 for the AGPM Service

segment.source: Cause: By default, the port on which the AGPM Service listens is port 4600.
segment.target: Cause: By default, the port on which the AGPM Service listens is port 4600.

segment.source: Solution: If port 4600 is not available for the AGPM Service, modify each archive index file to use another port and then update the AGPM Server for all Group Policy administrators.
segment.target: Solution: If port 4600 is not available for the AGPM Service, modify each archive index file to use another port and then update the AGPM Server for all Group Policy administrators.

segment.source: For more information, see Modify the Port on Which the AGPM Service Listens.
segment.target: For more information, see Modify the Port on Which the AGPM Service Listens.

segment.source: The AGPM Service will not start
segment.target: The AGPM Service will not start

segment.source: Cause: You have modified settings for the AGPM Service in the operating system under Administrative Tools and Services.
segment.target: Cause: You have modified settings for the AGPM Service in the operating system under Administrative Tools and Services.

segment.source: Solution: Modify the settings for Microsoft Advanced Group Policy Management - Server under Add or Remove Programs.
segment.target: Solution: Modify the settings for Microsoft Advanced Group Policy Management - Server under Add or Remove Programs.

segment.source: For more information, see Modify the AGPM Service Account.
segment.target: For more information, see Modify the AGPM Service Account.

segment.source: Group Policy Software Installation fails to install software
segment.target: Group Policy Software Installation fails to install software

segment.source: Cause: AGPM preserves the integrity of Group Policy Software Installation packages.
segment.target: Cause: AGPM preserves the integrity of Group Policy Software Installation packages.

segment.source: Although GPOs are edited offline, links between packages as well as cached client information are preserved.
segment.target: Although GPOs are edited offline, links between packages as well as cached client information are preserved.

segment.source: This is by design.
segment.target: This is by design.

segment.source: Solution: When editing a GPO offline with AGPM, configure any Group Policy Software Installation upgrade of a package in another GPO to reference the deployed GPO, not the checked-out copy.
segment.target: Solution: When editing a GPO offline with AGPM, configure any Group Policy Software Installation upgrade of a package in another GPO to reference the deployed GPO, not the checked-out copy.

segment.source: The Editor must have Read permission for the deployed GPO.
segment.target: The Editor must have Read permission for the deployed GPO.
